summary:
Organize code with modules and packages. Learn to create and import modules. Understand Python's module search path. Study packages and how to structure larger projects. Learn about the standard library and third-party packages. Practice using pip to install packages and manage dependencies.

This topic provides essential knowledge for understanding python at the Secondary level. Through comprehensive study, students will develop a deep understanding of the concepts, principles, and applications related to Modules and Packages. The material is designed to build a strong foundation for further learning and practical application in real-world contexts. This topic provides comprehensive coverage essential for understanding python at the intermediate level. Through detailed study, students will gain deep insights into the concepts, principles, and real-world applications. The material is designed to build a strong foundation for further learning and practical application in various contexts.
why_it_matters: This programming/technology topic provides practical skills highly sought after in the job market and enables you to build real-world applications and solve technical problems.
